statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 3 \\ 2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 15 \\ -11 \\ 11 \\ 7 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -54 \\ 43 \\ -30 \\ -16 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
